LanguageData.ReUplandRice.label: 陆稻种植
LanguageData.ReUplandRice.description: 改良在陆地上种植米稻的技术，增强生产力。
LanguageData.ReWetlandRice.label: 水稻种植
LanguageData.ReWetlandRice.description: 通过发展水稻田技术以进一步提高大米的生产力。
LanguageData.ReAquacultureFish.label: Farm fish net
LanguageData.ReAquacultureFish.description: Learn how to farm fish. The farming period is very long, but you can harvest very nutritious fish.\nCAUTION:To grow, light, appropriate temperature control and feed(fish food, earthworm, insect meat) is necessary.\nUnlock -> Farming fish(Necessary: Growing skill 10), Farm fish net (3x3)
LanguageData.ReAquacultureNet.label: Large Farm fish net
LanguageData.ReAquacultureNet.description: Learn how to make a large Farm fish net so that many fish can be farmed.\nUnlock -> Large Farm fish net(4x5)
LanguageData.ReBeans.label: Soybeans
LanguageData.ReBeans.description: Learn how to grow Soybeans and Edamame(immature Soybeans).\nUnlock -> Soybeans(Necessary: Growing skill 4),Edamame(Necessary: Growing skill 4)
LanguageData.ReZPSoil.label: Soil
LanguageData.ReZPSoil.description: Reserch agriculturally possible soil.\nSoil will be placed on sand, ice, gravel, rough stone, smooth stone.\nUnlock -> Soil(Fertility:100%)
LanguageData.ReZPSoilRich.label: Fertile Soil
LanguageData.ReZPSoilRich.description: Improve agriculturally possible soil to Rich Soil.\nUnlock -> Fertile Soil(Fertility:140%)
LanguageData.ReZPMud.label: Mud
LanguageData.ReZPMud.description: Reserch Mud for paddy fields.\nUnlock -> Mud,Mud gathering spot
LanguageData.ReZPLandfillSoil.label: Reclaimed soil
LanguageData.ReZPLandfillSoil.description: Fill the ground with poor footing.\nUnlock -> Reclaimed soil
LanguageData.ReSeasoning.label: Seasoning
LanguageData.ReSeasoning.description: Learn how to make seasonings that will enrich your diet.\nUnlock -> Rice syrup, Rice vineger, Soy souce, Miso
LanguageData.RePreservedFood.label: Preserved meals
LanguageData.RePreservedFood.description: Learn how to make preserved meals to preserve food for a long time.\nUnlock -> Nukaduke, Dried fish, Natto, Nuka pot
LanguageData.ReZPFurniture.label: Japanese style furniture
LanguageData.ReZPFurniture.description: Learn how to build Japanese style furniture to improve the living environment.\nUnlock -> Straw-woven bed, Uchiwa, Hibachi
LanguageData.ReThreshingRiceMillingMachine.label: All-purpose rice processing machine
LanguageData.ReThreshingRiceMillingMachine.descriptio: Learn how to make Agricultural tools to consume Inaho and convert it to White rice.
LanguageData.ReScarecrow.label: Scarecrow of fertility
LanguageData.ReScarecrow.description: Learn how to make the scarecrow accept the blessing of fertile God.\nAs long as there is an offering(fuel), Up 30% fertility of the soil within 9 squares.\nCAUTION:Paddy fields and hydroponics growers will not accept blessing.
LanguageData.ReFloatingSunLamp.label: Floating solar light(need fuel)
LanguageData.ReFloatingSunLamp.description: Learn how to build a floating solar light (need fuel) even in poor footing.\nUnlock -> Floating solar light(need fuel)
LanguageData.ReDefenseBase.label: Defense system
LanguageData.ReDefenseBase.description: Learn how to build a defense position.\nunlock -> Kaidate, Straw mass, Gunpowder in Straw mass
LanguageData.BlacksmithApprentice.label: Blacksmith Apprentice
LanguageData.BlacksmithApprentice.description: You can master the techniques of making NagayariSpears, Sasumata, JapaneseLongbow, MuneateArmor, Ninja clothes, Samurai clothes.
LanguageData.BlacksmithArtisan.label: Blacksmith Artisan
LanguageData.BlacksmithArtisan.description: You can master the techniques of making AsigaruArmor, JingasaHelmet, JumonjiSpear, OdachiBlade, JapaneseLongbow(poison).
LanguageData.BlacksmithMaster.label: Blacksmith Master
LanguageData.BlacksmithMaster.description: You can master the techniques of making SyogunArmor, SyogunHelmet, JapaneseLongbow(fire).
LanguageData.BlacksmithTanegasima.label: Blacksmith Tanegasima
LanguageData.BlacksmithTanegasima.description: You can master the techniques of making TanegasimaGun.
